name: MEC Globetrotter Waist Wallet - Unisex
description: Add some stealthy protection to your next trip. This waist wallet has an airmesh back panel to keep things comfortable, and it holds your cash and cards close so you can get through crowded train platforms and busy markets worry-free.Made of 210-denier nylon with a DWR finish so it won't absorb water or sweat.Airmesh back panel is soft on skin.2 pockets with YKK zippers and zipper garages for a slim profile under clothing.Low profile elastic waist belt is comfortable to wear.
